scripts.build: (npm run cpd-check || echo '⚠️  WARNING: Code duplication detected. Check output/reports/jscpd/ for details.') && next build
scripts.cpd-check: node --input-type=module -e "import {PROJECT_PATHS} from './project.config.mjs'; import {execSync} from 'child_process'; execSync('jscpd --config .jscpd.json ' + PROJECT_PATHS.sourceString, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.cpd-report: node --input-type=module -e "import {PROJECT_PATHS} from './project.config.mjs'; import {execSync} from 'child_process'; execSync('jscpd --config .jscpd.json ' + PROJECT_PATHS.sourceString, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.build:serve: rm -rf out && npm run build && npm run serve
